execution_plan.description: Get distinct pairs of customer_id and product_id from the orders system by joining Orders with Order_Items (these represent which customer bought which product).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT o.customer_id, oi.product_id FROM Orders o JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve customer IDs and first names for the customers referenced in step 1 from the users database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product IDs and product names for the products referenced in step 1 from the products database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
